document_data.name: Lump
document_data.mainbody:
'''Lump the Enlightened''' was a particularly canny and articulate [[ogre]] mercenary that worked on the [[Sword Coast]] during the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].

{{Quote|Am I not astonishing? A robust diet makes for a shrewd mind, you see. I am a gourmand...|Lump, in agreement about what a great specimen of ogre he is.}}
document_data.Personality:
Lump was quite well-spoken for an ogre and did the speaking for his group of three. While he displayed eloquence and a discerning taste for food not often found among other ogres, Lump was just as greedy and gluttonous as they came.

He could be considered one of the [[faithless]] as he did not worship any particular deity.
document_data.Possessions:
While Lump maintained his exceptional intelligence originated from his healthy appetite and varied diet, it was likely the effect of the ''[[headband of intellect]]'' he wore.

He also kept with him a ''[[Lump's war horn|war horn]]'', that allowed employers to call for he and his companions in battle.
document_data.Relationships: He worked alongside two less-intelligent ogres, [[Chock]] and [[Fank]].
